transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Haan ji, Parvej ji.
Customer: Parvej ji, Shubham baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART head office se.
Executive: Haan boliye boliye.
Executive: Ji sir aap 9696 pe lagayenge to bhi hamare paas hi aayega sir call to.
Customer: Malum hai, malum hai to aapne bola tha call sense nahi le raha fir aapko call cut gaya. Ab main dobara call kar raha hu to uthaya nahi.
Executive: Sir, sir Ranjeet ke samne khada hu abhi bhi dusri call pe hai. Aap samajhiye to main kyu nahi karaunga call.
Customer: Aapne bola main call pe le raha.
Executive: Sir aap mujhko ye to bol dete na ki 5-10 minute dijiyega.
Customer: Maine ye bola pehle ki main
Executive: Maine ye bola ki main call kara raha hu sir aapki call isliye Ranjeet baat kariye.

Executive: Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan apna WhatsApp on karna please.
Customer: Haan sir kar raha hu sir.


Executive: Thik hai matlab ki Shweta mam se inki baat chal rahi hai na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Wahi hai lekin sunko lijiyega baat puri.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Shweta mam ne dekho 10 tarikh ko valid aayi aur time line time bhi dekhna chahe to kuch Shweta mam 10:15 baje aati hai to unhone mere hisab se jo dala hai 10:27 ekdum exact time pe dala hai, thik hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan 10:27 mein dal diya.
Customer: Main unko galat nahi keh sakta.
Executive: Thik hai. Unhone reply bhi 10:28 mein kiya hai jaha par tak main dekh raha hu.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Client ne uske baad inhone meri client ne bola okay thik hai. 300 and dono rate bhi ₹6.30 paise ki rate ki baat hui thik hai packing pucha thik hai uske baad unse on call baat hui Shweta ji.
Executive: Sir suniye suniye main apne number se call kar raha hu.
Customer: Sir.
Executive: Main apne number se call kar raha hu sir wo sir ka phone hai to main unko de raha hu aap main aapko call kar raha hu thik hai.
Customer: Please karo.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's call was disconnected earlier.

- Call was not picked up when customer called again.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the reason for the call delay.

- Executive confirmed Shweta mam is handling the client.

- Executive offered to call from his personal number.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- call delay, whatsapp, client, follow up
